posts.post_title: Looking to Buy Mayo Cut Cards
posts.post_content:
Hi All,

Looking for Mayo Cut Plug cards. Mostly looking for baseball but would look at some boxers/football as well.

Mainly looking for low grades/authentic or raw cards

Let me know what you have. Happy to make a deal.

Thanks in advance
Dan

Still looking?
